nodes.title: Define artificial intelligence
nodes.desc: Understand the concept of AI and its applications in various fields. [Stanford AI Lab](https://ai.stanford.edu/)

nodes.title: Learn machine learning
nodes.desc: Study the subset of AI that enables machines to learn from data without being explicitly programmed. [Machine Learning Crash Course](https://developers.google.com/machine-learning/crash-course)

nodes.title: Study optimization techniques
nodes.desc: Learn how to optimize functions using various algorithms. [Optimization Techniques Tutorial](https://www.optimization.org/)

nodes.title: Learn about autonomous vehicles
nodes.desc: Understand how AI can be applied to create self-driving cars. [Autonomous Vehicles Tutorial](https://www.autonomousvehicles.org/)

nodes.title: Study human-computer interaction
nodes.desc: Learn how to design interfaces that are intuitive and user-friendly. [Human-Computer Interaction Tutorial](https://www.hcibook.com/)

nodes.title: Familiarize with cognitive architectures
nodes.desc: Learn how to model human cognition using computational models. [Cognitive Architectures Tutorial](https://www.cogarch.org/)

nodes.title: Learn about affective computing
nodes.desc: Understand how to recognize and generate emotions in computers. [Affective Computing Tutorial](https://www.affectivecomputing.org/)

nodes.title: Study social learning
nodes.desc: Learn how agents can learn from each other. [Social Learning Tutorial](https://www.sociallearning.org/)

nodes.title: Learn about swarm intelligence
nodes.desc: Understand how collective behavior can emerge from individual agents. [Swarm Intelligence Tutorial](https://www.swarmintelligence.org/)

nodes.title: Familiarize with evolutionary computation
nodes.desc: Learn how to use evolutionary principles to optimize functions. [Evolutionary Computation Tutorial](https://www.evocomp.org/)

nodes.title: Study artificial life
nodes.desc: Learn how to simulate and understand the behavior of living systems. [Artificial Life Tutorial](https://www.artificial-life.org/)

nodes.title: Learn about cognitive science
nodes.desc: Understand how to study the mind and its processes. [Cognitive Science Tutorial](https://www.cognitivescience.org/)

nodes.title: Understand deep learning
nodes.desc: Explore the subset of machine learning that uses neural networks to analyze data. [Deep Learning Tutorial](https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/deep_learning)

nodes.title: Familiarize with neuroscience
nodes.desc: Learn how to study the brain and its functions. [Neuroscience Tutorial](https://www.neuroscience.org/)

nodes.title: Study philosophy of mind
nodes.desc: Learn how to understand the nature of consciousness and intelligence. [Philosophy of Mind Tutorial](https://www.philosophyofmind.org/)

nodes.title: Familiarize with natural language processing
nodes.desc: Learn how computers can understand and generate human language. [Natural Language Processing Tutorial](https://www.nltk.org/book/)

nodes.title: Study computer vision
nodes.desc: Understand how computers can interpret and understand visual data from images and videos. [Computer Vision Tutorial](https://www.opencv.org/)

nodes.title: Learn robotics
nodes.desc: Understand how AI can be applied to robotics to create autonomous systems. [Robotics Tutorial](https://www.robotics.org/)

nodes.title: Understand agent-based modeling
nodes.desc: Learn how to model complex systems using autonomous agents. [Agent-Based Modeling Tutorial](https://www.santafe.edu/education/online-courses/agent-based-modeling)

nodes.title: Study multi-agent systems
nodes.desc: Learn how to design and analyze systems composed of multiple autonomous agents. [Multi-Agent Systems Tutorial](https://www.masfoundations.org/)

nodes.title: Learn game theory
nodes.desc: Understand how to analyze and design systems where multiple agents interact. [Game Theory Tutorial](https://www.game-theory.org/)

nodes.title: Familiarize with decision theory
nodes.desc: Learn how to make decisions under uncertainty. [Decision Theory Tutorial](https://www.decision-theory.org/)
